features: Hanging Toiletry Bag - Built-in hook allows hanging the toiletry kit from towel rack, coat hook or whereever is available, making your toiletries and cosmetics displayed well for quickly find what you need and save time.

Travel Toiletry Bag - Size 3.5" X 6.5" X 10".Travel Organizer Bag with 3 different compartments - small pocket, mesh pocket and clear waterproof pocket to keep things in good order. Etercycle's Toiletry Bag offers enough room for all of your travel items.

Foldable & Portable - You can take the mens toiletry bag anywhere with the portable handle or put it in the suitcase or backpack, compact foldabledesign takes up very little room in your luggage.Unique design allows you to get a toiletry bag, shaving kit, and makeup bag/cosmetic bag all in one.

Waterproof & Wet/Dry Separation - Etercycle's toiletries bag is made of superb quality nylon oxford materials and waterproof coating that can protect your toiletries from water damage and keep away from chaos.Clear pockets combines with mesh compartment, wet items can be placed in clear pockets to keep other pockets dry.

Various Occasions - In addition to traveling, you can take it to the gym, on business trips, or camping. You can also hang it at home, packing some infrequently used items to save space and make things less crowded. It's a great gift for your family and friends.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Etercycle Toiletry Organizer for men We have made heavy & inconvenient makeup organizers a story of the past!The foldable and Ultra lightweight toiletry bag will carry your toiletry essentials in good organization by taking minimum space in your luggage. It is a perfect way to keep all your items organized with three different roomy compartments. What’s more, it's excellent quality and durable material to ensure a long lifespan.If you are a frequent traveler, organize your toiletries, quickly and efficiently is important for you. Etercycle toiletry organizer can meet all your demands. Water-resistant material, dual-zipper design, wet and dry separation system make you travel confidently knowing that your toiletries will be kept in their place.Etercycle small travel toiletry bag boasts huge capacity with elegantly designed internal pouches, hanging hook, zipped pockets inside for complete flexibility. With all your toiletry accessories well-organized, you will enjoy it whenever you are out for your business trips, holidays and overnight stays in a hotel, at weddings, or just at home on your vanity!

Functional Toiletry Bag Compact Size: 10 x 6.5 x3.5 inchLightwight: 0.44 lbssmall pocket compartment: store small items like potions, pills and cotton swab.Mesh Bag Compartment: keep you large travel essentials like shampoo, lotions or Shaver organized.Waterproof Compartment:can put wet items such as wet towelsIt can be used a toiletry wash bag, makeup bag, cosmetic Bag, travel kit , shaving kit bag.

Designed for Women and Men Unique design allows you to get a toiletry bag, shaving kit, and makeup bag/cosmetic bag all in one. And the High capacity compartment easy to carry your toiletries, whole bottle of conditioner, shampoo, and shower gel. Hanging Travel Toiletry Bag This Toiletry bag is make of high quality fabric and lining, give you a comfortable touch feeling, and in the meanwhile, it is durable, lightweight, waterproof and washable, never worry about liquid spilled out, you can very easy to clean it without issue. Serves As An Ideal Gift Whether a gift for yourself or someone special, it will be a perfect way to express your love in any occasion such as birthdays, weddings, or Christmas.

Compact Size The compact collapsing design makes the bag small enough to fit your suitcase or trunk. It is great packing for business trips, summer vacations, or out of town family holidays. Wet and dry separation Separate waterproof area to better separate wet items and protect your items. Large Capacity Large capacity of our toiletry bag enables you store all of your full-sized accessories, such as lotions, shampoo and powder foundation.

Practical & Elegant Etercycle toiletry bag frees you from organizational panic and keeps you elegant. Soft colors, comfortable material and multi-functional compartments facilitate your life. You will be amazed at its inconvenience in use with its thoughtful feature and noble looking.
Etercycle toiletry bag can serve as your Bathroom Organizer, Home Storage and Traveling Companion. The versatility of our product makes it a great option for you when purchasing toiletry bags.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Minimal Traveler Gift
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this for my significant other who goes on work trips and needed a small toiletry bag for themselves. This is perfect and the mesh and plastic are great to see what has been packed. Also, no issues with the zipper so far (I know this is common on cheaper items)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for traveling . Well Made for the price.
reviews.reviewText: I needed something light weight for a camping trip I was going on. This was perfect . Well made and holds a lot more than I expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quality, compact toiletry bag
reviews.reviewText: This is a good compact toiletry bag. If you have lots of stuff, you may not like this - but for those who travel very light, this is perfect. The bag I've used for years on many trips is about the same size and a bit lighter, but it only has one compartment. This is better if you like to be organized, since it has separate compartments, including one for items that could leak or get wet. I'm not taking off for the small size since that's what it's advertised for - just consider if it's large enough before you order.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I liked the size, fabric and compartments of this carrier. Was looking for a sleek design that was easy to pack. Works great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for a man
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect fit for my husbands shower items. It wouldn’t be big enough for a women with lots of shower things

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Travel coloring kit
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 6 year old for a plane trip. I put all his markets and crayons in along with some travel games. Thus bag kept everything tidy and was easy for my son to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pay attention to the size
reviews.reviewText: My fault for not minding the size. Cute and decent quality, but way too small for my needs. Definitely will be returning found similar products that fit FULL SIZE bottles and suppport so much extra. I have wayy too many products. If you travel light and actually carry 'travel size' toiletries, this may be perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just received it and it is as advertised. Was able to nicely organize everything in a compact bag.
I’ve been looking for a 2 compartment travel bag and this one is pretty good! Just the right size for carrry on or longer trips

Je l’ai acheté pour un voyage de 6 mois en Asie et jusqu’à présent je l’adore! Le format est parfait et peut contenir beaucoup d’articles sans être trop gros pour autant. Franchement je suis impressionnée de la qualité du produit pour le prix. Je suis très satisfaite!

The size of the pockets are nice. Holds what I wanted without being overly bulky. The only thing I would change is the side the handle is on. It would feel more natural if the handle was on the side of the zipper. When it is open, the handle is folded under.

I love this toiletry bag! The two large compartments hold all the products I need and the small upper pocket is great for small tools like tweezers, or cotton pads. I love that there’s a hook at the top so I can hang it on a towel rack or knob and easily access my product! It’s a great travel toiletry bag but also great for daily use as well especially if you like to keep your products organized!
